alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:38PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Umatilla and central Union Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 238 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hilgard, or near La Grande, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grande, Elgin, Island City, Imbler, Summerville, Minam, Tollgate, Spout Springs and Hilgard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
